name: NG-WooCommerce-MoeDelo
author: Nikita Menshutin

sections.description:
Allows to issue invoices via https://moedelo.org/ cloud
accounting service.

Checks customer tax number, creates customers, issues invoice, then tracks payments
via API.

https://nikita.global/

This plugin makes HTTP-requests to 3rd party service moedelo.org API
to create customer, find existing customer by Tax Number (INN), issue invoice, check
if invoice is paid

= 1.5.1 (2020-04-30)
* Fixed crucial localization bug

= 1.5 (2020-04-30)
* Localization issues

= 1.4 (2020-04-30)
* Custom template available
* more filters available
* minor bug fixed

= 1.1 (2020-02-27)
* Localization issues

1.0 (2020-02-21)

  • The First Upload, but was tested before at several sites
